TI: [Receptor binding of corticosterone in brain structures participating in regulation of the hypothalamo-hypophyseo-adrenal system].
AB: Binding of corticosterone by the cytosol receptors after hydrocortisone administration was studied in different tissues of rats. A decrease in the specific binding of corticosterone occurred within 24 hrs in all the structures under study. In 3 days the decrease only persisted in the hypophysis and hypothalamus. The data suggest a connection between the long lasting decrease in the cytosol reception of corticosterone in the hypothalamus and hypophysis and the blockade of the hypothalamo-hypophyseal-adrenal system.
TT: Retseptornoe sviazyvanie kortikosterona v strukturakh mozga, prinimaiushchikh uchastie v reguliatsii gipotalamo-gipofizarno-nadpochechnikovoi sistemy.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1983 Nov;69(11):1463-6.
